topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Final thoughts time!
[spoiler]Tamers beats Adventure and 02 by a goddamn mile. The story, the characters, the animation, hell even the soundtrack were LEAGUES above the Adventure series. The interactions between the various Tamers and their Digimon were always interesting and varied. The D-Reaper made an AMAZING final villain and I was actually nervous during the final episode. My main problem with the series is, as stated, Ryo. If you cut Ryo from the story nothing would be lost. But all in all, it was pretty damn good.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548aa5096368721bf3080000#post_548aa5096368721bf3080000
I'd say that Gan-Q was at about the same level as the D-reaper. (Gaia beat him once by forcing his way out of his dimension, And He beat him again by tossing him around a bunch, And eventually taking advantage of a distraction to hit him with a beam)

He didn't even need Agul to beat him.
